title: Gokulathu Radhai Vanthalo Lyrics Aanandham
stanzas:
Soodi thandha sudarkodiye
sugavelai nee varuga
thaedi konda thiraviyame
thaer maalai pola varuga
minnum ambu vizhi
chandhira pimbam
ponoli veesa
mangai myithili un
sandhana kaalgal
thandaigal aada
sangam soozha varuga
sri rangan thaazhai adaiya
valar thingalaagi varuga.

Gokulathu radhai vanthalo
indha kalyaana thaerile.
midhilinagar seethai vanthalo
indha veettodu vazhave.
indha  veettodu vazhave.

andha thenmadurai meenaal
vilakkaetra vandhaal
seethanamaai kaiyil
thaai paasam kondu vanthaal.

Gokulathu radhai vanthalo
indha kalyaana thaerile.
midhilinagar seethai vanthalo
indha veettodu vazhave.
indha  veettodu vazhave.

ponnu kondu vandha
seer vaangi vaikka
perusaa veedu onnu kattunga.

thanga maapillaiku
eedaaga neenga.
innum paththu madangu
kottunga.

thanga maapillaiyin
nenjil ammaanaiyaadi
selaiyila mudinji
jeyippaale enga ponnu.

moonu molam malligaipoovum
konjam halwavum podhume.
endha pennum aambala
nenjil ada thalsaanji mayangume

thanjavur bomma polathaan
unga mapaillathaan
thalayaattuvaar
dhesingu raja engannan
unga kudhira vaalaattumaa

hey thappaama enga ponnu
seivaale thandhiram
singathai katti podum
thalakaani mandhiram.

potiellaam potu pathomdi
adhu namakullathaanadi
jodiyathaan nallaa paaradi
madhura meenakshi sokkandi.

velli pani mutrathil
vetkam enum thottathil
malligai poothatho.
pudhu malligai pooththatho.

maadakuyil saththathil
manjal mugalaanathil
mangalam vandhatho
dhinam mangalam vandhatho

ini engal nenja koodathil
deepa thiruvizha
enga vaanil velicham
veesuthe chinna vennila

engal anbukku
annan panbukku
thendral sandhanam
poosudho.

engal veettukkul
veesum thendralaai
oru dhevathai vanthadho.
